item.title: Taha add a quote by سید علی صالحی
item.description: "سنگین از نگفتنم" -- سید علی صالحی

item.title: Taha add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Taha add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Taha add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Taha add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Taha add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Taha add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Taha add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Love is a better master than duty." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Taha add a quote by Joyce Carol Oates
item.description: "Reading is the sole means by which we slip, involuntarily, often helplessly, into another's skin, another's voice, another's soul." -- Joyce Carol Oates

item.title: Taha add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Taha add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Taha add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Taha add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious - the fundamental emotion which stands at the cradle of true art and true science." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Taha add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Taha add a quote by Leonardo da Vinci
item.description: "Painting is poetry that is seen rather than felt, and poetry is painting that is felt rather than seen." -- Leonardo da Vinci

item.title: Taha add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "O Romeo, Romeo, wherefore art thou Romeo? Deny thy father refuse thy name, thou art thyself thou not a montegue, what is montegue? tis nor hand nor foot nor any other part belonging to a man What is in a name? That which we call a rose by any other name would smell as sweet, So Romeo would were he not Romeo called retain such dear perfection to which he owes without that title, Romeo, Doth thy name! And for that name which is no part of thee, take all thyself." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Taha add a quote by Cicero
item.description: "If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need." -- Cicero

item.title: Taha add a quote by Ludwig Wittgenstein
item.description: "Never stay up on the barren heights of cleverness, but come down into the green valleys of silliness." -- Ludwig Wittgenstein

item.title: Taha add a quote by Ludwig Wittgenstein
item.description: "Whereof one cannot speak, thereof one must be silent." -- Ludwig Wittgenstein

item.title: Taha add a quote by رسول یونان
item.description: "تو ماه را بیشتر از همه دوست می داشتی و حالا ماه هر شب تو را به یاد من می آورد می خواهم فراموشت کنم اما این ماه با هیچ دستمالی از پنجره ها پاک نمی شود" -- رسول یونان
